title: Resolution electing Senator Sampson as Temporary President and Majority Leader of the Senate
fulltext:
SENATE  RESOLUTION  providing  for  the  election  of John L. Sampson as
Temporary President and Majority Leader of the Senate for 2011-2012

RESOLVED, That Senator John L. Sampson be, and  he  hereby  is,  elected
Temporary  President  and  Majority  Leader  of the Senate for the years
2011-2012.
